direction: Use XGBoost with the following settings: n_estimators=700, learning_rate=0.03, max_depth=7, subsample=0.85, colsample_bytree=0.8. For preprocessing, fill numeric NaN values with the median and use LabelEncoder for categorical features. Ensure that all features are properly encoded before training.
executor_guidance: Make sure to handle NaN values in all columns before passing the data to the model. Use LabelEncoder for categorical features to avoid memory issues. If you encounter any dtype errors, cast the categorical features to strings before encoding.
